record.description: Julia and Harry Abrahamson stand at the right as she shakes hand with Alderman Leon Despres at her farewell party. In 1959, Julia's book about the Hyde Park-Kenwood Community Conference, "A Neighborhood Finds Itself," was published by Harper.
record.source: Archival Photographic Files. Addenda. Mildred Mead Photographs
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Negative on file, included with group of negs in envelope id'ing date and location of function as Ida Noyes Hall. Curling.
